definition: article/commodity/product/goods/kind/grade/rank/character/disposition/nature/temperament/variety/to taste sth/to sample/to criticize/to comment/to judge/to size up/fret (on a guitar or lute)

sentences.english: The sado is the humanity and tea is always closely related to the moral behavior.
sentences.chinese: 茶道即人道，茶品与人品总是紧密地联系在一起。

sentences.english: She had dared to cast a slur on his character.
sentences.chinese: 她竟敢对他的人品加以诋毁。

sentences.english: Good looks catch the eyes but good personality catches the heart.
sentences.chinese: 漂亮的脸蛋能吸引眼球，但好的人品能虏获人心。

sentences.english: In the light of his aptitude, personality and diligence, he will surly be promoted soon.
sentences.chinese: 他能力强，人品好，办事勤快，显然会步步高升的。

sentences.english: It takes good people to triumph in football, they say.
sentences.chinese: 据说想拿荣誉得人品好。

sentences.english: Mr. Frick is a good judge of character.
sentences.chinese: 弗里克先生是个善于判断人品的人。

sentences.english: Therefore, it became a case about the character of Li Dongyang.
sentences.chinese: 这样，关于李东阳的人品问题也就成了一桩讼案。

sentences.english: The men who are not really handsome but have good moral behavior are not all rich.
sentences.chinese: 不大帅人品好而有钱的男人都以为我们想谋他们的钱。

sentences.english: Even the attractiveness of her person had undergone a similar change.
sentences.chinese: 就连她人品上的魅力也经历了类似的变化。

sentences.english: Mr. Yu-Tsen has a very good personality, which is the prerequisite of his artistic accomplishment.
sentences.chinese: 佑增先生人品好，是他艺品的前提条件。

sentences.english: He was popular as much for his personal qualities as for his cricketing skills.
sentences.chinese: 他的人品和板球技术同样使他受人喜爱。

sentences.english: In these terms, we are thinking artistic character.
sentences.chinese: 我们考虑的是艺术家的人品。

sentences.english: By aptitude, personality and work he is obviously slated to go up.
sentences.chinese: 他有才能，人品好，办事勤奋，显然会步步高升。

sentences.english: For Confucius, political honesty is based on individual ethical integrity.
sentences.chinese: 在孔子看来，政治的说法是以人品的正直为基础的。

sentences.english: But I figure that with my grades and with my personality, I'll have no problem.
sentences.chinese: 但我估计凭我的成绩和人品，我不会有问题的。

definition: emotional quotient (EQ)/emotional IQ/abbr. for 情緒商數|情绪商数[qing2 xu4 shang1 shu4]
one's character/fret (on fingerboard of lute or guitar)
